00040 #include "AGFrame.h"

00048 // ===========================================================================
00049 // method definitions
00050 // ===========================================================================
00051 void AGFrame::fillOptions() {
00052     OptionsCont& oc = OptionsCont::getOptions();
00053     // give some application descriptions
00054     oc.setApplicationDescription(
00055         "Generates routes of persons throughout a day for the microscopic road traffic simulation SUMO.");
00056     oc.setApplicationName("activitygen", "SUMO activitygen Version " + (std::string)VERSION_STRING);
00057     oc.addCopyrightNotice("Copyright (C) 2010-2011 Technische Universitaet Muenchen");
00058     // Options handling
00059     oc.addCallExample("--net-file <INPUT>.net.xml --stat-file <INPUT>.stat.xml --output <OUTPUT>.rou.xml --abs-rand");
00060     oc.addCallExample("--net-file <INPUT>.net.xml --stat-file <INPUT>.stat.xml --output <OUTPUT>.rou.xml --duration-d <NBR_OF_DAYS>");
00061 
00062     // Add categories and insert the standard options
00063     SystemFrame::addConfigurationOptions(oc);
00064     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Input");
00065     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Output");
00066     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Processing");
00067     oc.addOptionSubTopic("Time");
00068     SystemFrame::addReportOptions(oc);
00069     RandHelper::insertRandOptions();
00070 
00071     // Insert options
00072     oc.doRegister("net-file", 'n', new Option_FileName());
00073     oc.addSynonyme("net-file", "net");
00074     oc.addDescription("net-file", "Input", "Use FILE as SUMO-network to route on");
00075 
00076     oc.doRegister("stat-file", 's', new Option_FileName());
00077     oc.addDescription("stat-file", "Input", "Loads the SUMO-statistics FILE");
00078 
00079     oc.doRegister("output-file", 'o', new Option_FileName());
00080     oc.addSynonyme("output-file", "output", true);
00081     oc.addDescription("output-file", "Output", "Write generated routes to FILE");
00082 
00083     oc.doRegister("debug", new Option_Bool(false));
00084     oc.addDescription("debug", "Report",
00085                       "Detailed messages about every single step");
00086 
00087     // TODO: What time options are consistent with other parts of SUMO and
00088     // useful for the user?
00089     oc.doRegister("begin", 'b', new Option_Integer());
00090     oc.addDescription("begin", "Time", "Sets the time of beginning of the simulation during the first day (in seconds)");
00091 
00092     oc.doRegister("end", 'e', new Option_Integer());
00093     oc.addDescription("end", "Time", "Sets the time of ending of the simulation during the last day (in seconds)");
00094 
00095     oc.doRegister("duration-d", new Option_Integer());
00096     oc.addDescription("duration-d", "Time", "Sets the duration of the simulation in days");
00097 
00098     // Options needed by the router
00099     oc.doRegister("weights.interpolate", new Option_Bool(false));
00100     oc.addSynonyme("weights.interpolate", "interpolate", true);
00101     oc.addDescription("weights.interpolate", "Processing", "Interpolate edge weights at interval boundaries");
00102 
00103     oc.doRegister("weights.expand", new Option_Bool(false));
00104     oc.addSynonyme("weights.expand", "expand-weights", true);
00105     oc.addDescription("weights.expand", "Processing", "Expand weights behind the simulation's end");
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 bool AGFrame::checkOptions() {
00110     return true;
00111 }
